Class NeighborCFTwosCombined

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.AlgAbstract

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, java.util.EventListener, net.hudup.core.alg.Alg, net.hudup.core.alg.AlgRemote, net.hudup.core.alg.AlgRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.alg.cf.MemoryBasedCF, net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedAlg, net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedAlgRemote, net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedAlgRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.alg.MemoryBasedRecommender, net.hudup.core.alg.Recommender, net.hudup.core.alg.RecommenderRemote, net.hudup.core.alg.RecommenderRemoteTask, net.hudup.core.alg.SetupAlgListener, net.hudup.core.alg.SupportCacheAlg, net.hudup.core.data.Exportable, net.hudup.core.logistic.Inspectable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NeighborCFTwosCombinedItemBased, NeighborCFTwosCombinedUserBased

    public abstract class NeighborCFTwosCombined
extends NeighborCFExt
    This abstract class implements basically the combined collaborative filtering algorithm that combines two measures.
    Author Ali Amer proposed such combination.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ali Amer
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
